amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the "Energy Star" designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the "Energy Star" designation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harman amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Harman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harman amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
